conversion_verification.notes: The 3D render clearly shows vertical walls, thickness, and a perceptible interior volume from an angled view with the roof removed.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent conversion fundamentals. All aspects of dimensional transformation, viewing angle, and cutaway treatment are perfectly executed.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Near perfect geometric accuracy. All rooms are present, adjacency is correct, and wall positions/lengths are well-preserved. Minor discrepancies in door/window details for external walls.

interior_elements.notes: All major furniture and fixtures are present, correctly placed, and scaled appropriately within their designated rooms.

visual_clarity.notes: Excellent visual clarity and rendering. The geometry is readable, interior is well-lit, and there are no major artifacts. The text labels on the floor are a minor detraction from presentation.

detected_errors.description: Some external windows/doors are not perfectly matched in number or exact placement/proportion to the 2D plan, e.g., the window near BED-2.
Numerical and text labels from the 2D plan are rendered directly onto the floor of the 3D model, which detracts slightly from visual clarity and aesthetic coherence.

summary: The 3D render is an excellent and geometrically faithful transformation of the 2D floor plan, maintaining high accuracy in layout, dimensions, and interior representation with only minor aesthetic issues.
